dict.array:
cell PSGroupCell label %APP_NAME% isStaticText
cell PSSwitchCell default
defaults io.c0ldra1n.mitsuhaxi-prefs label Enabled key MSH%APP_ID%Enabled alternateColors
cell PSSwitchCell default
defaults io.c0ldra1n.mitsuhaxi-prefs label Enable FFT key MSH%APP_ID%EnableFFT alternateColors
%EXTRA%
cell PSLinkCell cellClass PFSimpleLiteColorCell libcolorpicker
defaults io.c0ldra1n.mitsuhaxi-colors key MSH%APP_ID%WaveColor fallback %APP_COLOR% alpha
label Wave color
cell PSStaticTextCell label Wave offset (top)
cell PSSliderCell label Wave offset (top) defaults io.c0ldra1n.mitsuhaxi-prefs key MSH%APP_ID%WaveOffset min -150 max 150 showValue
isSegmented
cell PSStaticTextCell label Frames per second
cell PSSliderCell label Frames per second default %APP_FPS% defaults io.c0ldra1n.mitsuhaxi-prefs key MSH%APP_ID%Fps min 5 max 240 showValue
isSegmented
cell PSGroupCell footerText MitsuhaXI isStaticText
cell PSGroupCell footerText Mitsuha, Mitsuha2 by c0ldra1n,$ ported to iOS 11 by Ominousness. isStaticText
